This an experimental malaria model incorporating human sensitivity and resistance to malaria parasite (This will be updated in due cause)

## Installation

You can install the development version of packmalaria using devtools::install_github("olatundemi/packmalaria")


## basic example code
# Run the simulation
params <- get_params(c0 = 0.3, 
                    lambda = 0.01)
results_df <- simulate_model(time_steps = 365, params)
